text: The prognosis of some rare tumours such as neuroendocrine carcinoma of the cervix is worse compared with cervical squamous cell carcinomas or adenocarcinomas.Non HPV-related adenocarcinomas or adenosquamous carcinomas have worse survival than squamous cell carcinomas.
